title: Her Stepbrother's Bride: Billionaire Stepbrother Romance
description: Stepsiblings Melanie Jacobs and billionaire Christian Evans have agreed to raise their baby together. Melanie struggles to convince herself that she wants nothing more than a simple life and platonic, co-parenting arrangement with her stepbrother. But Christian is madly in love with his beautiful stepsister, and is determined to win her heart. Will Melanie resist Christian’s love, or will she find herself becoming … Her Stepbrother’s Bride?
author: Taryn James
